name: From the Abyss (itch)
description:
A dark ritual with unintended consequences. An inscrutable, undulating force of nature. When you have already lost everything, what would sacrifice to achieve your ends?

Join Tristan and a creature he summoned out of the depths of the void as they journey to consume all in their path.

Prototype to test out some animations and battle sequences surrounding Aekashics' dragonbones animated battlers.
